title: The Unsung Documents of College Athletics
description: An investigation into the lesser-known documents that reveal the inner workings of college athletics, including car dealerships, flight manifests, occasional meal forms, will-call tickets, car registration forms, summer job forms, president’s box, ticket database, NCAA violations, NCAA financials, compliance-department audits, academic progress rate, coaches’ contracts, university police blotters, media guides, personnel files, public-record requests, eBay, court records, health-code violations, IRS form 990, and extra resources.
